snippet: The Dow Jones industrial average and Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index had their best month since January after the Fed reaffirmed its commitment to support the economy.
abstract: Stock market, after day of stalled rallies, closes out July with its best monthly gain since January.
lead_paragraph: The Dow Jones industrial average and Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index had their best month since January after the Fed reaffirmed its commitment to support the economy.

headline.main: Fed Support Lifted Wall St. to Best Month Since January
headline.print_headline: Fed Support Lifted Wall St. To Best Month Since January
